body:
Lol nice pic! :p
On Sep 28, 2015 11:35 PM, "Jules Mazur" notifications@github.com wrote:

> Progress beyond what was developed and presented at Hack the North. Not
> without its share of issues but much more coherent and consolidated than
> something that was thrown together over almost 36 sleepless hours using
> copious amounts of Red Bull and coffee while dealing with missing
> mission-critical hardware (go figure).
> 
> Summary of work done:
> [image: fzbrebj]
> 
> ## https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1712054/10154771/8ee41b36-6639-11e5-9e70-ef6107fa9e23.jpg
> 
> You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at:
> 
>   https://github.com/verandaguy/bikeTrack/pull/6
> Commit Summary
> - Many fixes for visitor frontend
> - Working rendering on dash
> - Major UI overhaul, server-side updates, new schema
>
